scripts.prerender-html: node scripts/prerender.js && node src/server/prerender.js && rm src/server/prerender.js
scripts.prerender-app-css: yarn sass --load-path=node_modules --no-source-map --style=compressed src/stylesheets/app.scss build/stylesheets/app.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write build/stylesheets/app.css
scripts.start: rm -rf build && mkdir build && yarn prerender-html && yarn prerender-duomo-css && yarn prerender-app-css && node scripts/start.js
scripts.build: rm -rf build && mkdir build && yarn prerender-html && yarn prerender-duomo-css && yarn prerender-app-css && NODE_ENV=production node scripts/build.js
